channel.title: Snow/Fog/Weather
channel.description: I have no clue what happened, but herers the story. I left my server running, and went out to eat. Came back, and noticed there was snow. I thought, ok, easy fix. ::nosnow. Then i realized that non-staff users can still see snow. So, they were complaining. Then, i left again, and came back, and there was fog. So now, there is either fog or snow. Short story, how do i get it off, or make ::nosnow for all?

item.title: Snow/Fog/Weather
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

This occurs on many servers, usually on pimpscape ones, if you look in client.java and search for:

randomweather

Remove the whole of that int and then save/compile.

Be carful though, you donâ€™t want to get the satrt of the next int wrong.

Read full topic

item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

to change ur weather go into ur wearther notpad thing and put 1 2 or 3

1 - snow 2 - fog 3 - normel then save and compile.
